text: [APPLAUSE]

So the private funds
market is immensely

important for any economy,
for any capital market.

It's important for innovation
and transformation.

China's private funds
market is already
at a trillion dollar size.

But today, they are
facing a big crisis.

We had billions of
dollars of fraud,

including Ponzi
schemes, that happened
last year and this year.

As a result, barriers
are being raised.

Costs of business
have increased.

And investor trust and
confidence have decreased.

Now, this is due to transparency
issues in the market.

Tens of thousands of entities
and businesses cannot get
reliable information.

And are not interconnected
to each other.

Totodi is providing the solution
as an enterprise IT platform,

to bring interconnectivity
between these businesses.

So that transparency,
efficiency, and reliability
can return to this market.

We're the team experienced
across the industry.

We're helping regulators
setting up industry standards.

And we also have a
first mover advantage
in the market share so far.

We still continue
pursuing our dreams.
Thank you.
[APPLAUSE]
